content.new:
Can you please add a topic to the bridge that would be of type blob/Blob and each robot would have it? Its sole purpose would be to be able to log data from the solution container for later analysis.

This is a follow up to [#!/osrf/subt/issues/176/urban-feature-access-to-simulation-robot#comment-53863174](#!/osrf/subt/issues/176/urban-feature-access-to-simulation-robot#comment-53863174)

As I have been watching the technical interchange part of the results announcements, I’ve noticed we were not the only ones struggling to bring our local functionality to the cloud. Being able to log binary data is essential capability for us to help pinpoint what is different in the cloud and in turn help improve the cloud simulation.

I proposing this with the hope that we can use this feature to make the Urban Circuit better for everyone.

issue.title: Add blob/Blob topic to bridge to allow logging binary data from solution container
